Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is PORTUGAL ESTRELA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 06 PT2. Smoked Sauages ingredients may include pig meat, fat and blood, bread, onions, wine and spices, among others. The sausage is smoked with oak and chestnut wood, among others, for different time periods, depending on the type of Smoked Sausage. These products are sold locally, in large urban centers and, also, exported.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Cordilheira Central (RR08). The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Seia. Located on the western slope of Serra da Estrela, Seia is a municipality with 21 parishes, in the district of Guarda in the Centre region of Portugal. Seia shares with the municipalities of Covilh√£ and Manteigas, the highest point in mainland Portugal at 1993 meters of altitude. Seia has a strong industrial tradition, mainly related to textiles and the distribution of electricity. The production of sheep's cheese is also a tradition.   The size of the area (km2) is 435.41. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 159. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 1993. The total population (in thousand) is 22.234. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 51. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.11%. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 78.6. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.05%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 48.20%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 38.55%.   Products connected to territorial identity. Smoked Sausages are traditionally homemade products, made by family members at the time of the slaughter of their own pig. Nowadays, the production of this products has been industrialized. Products characteristic of the MRL.   Traditional knowledge, passed down from generation to generation, on Smoked Sausages manufacture techniques.    Preserve traditional knowledge on Smoked Sausages manufacture. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. The innovation is related to the whole VC. The land use systems involved are N/A. The local assets include Cultural.   Different types of Smoked Sausages, with different types of meats and seasonings, are produced in several parts of Portugal.
